articles.author: South Bend Tribune Report
articles.title: Deputies investigate attempted robbery at Elkhart hotel
articles.description: SOUTH BEND — Elkhart County deputies are investigating after a man attempted to rob a hotel southwest of Elkhart late Thursday.

articles.title: MAPA's prefabricated cabins allow guests to survey Uruguayan vineyard

articles.author: BY ZACH IRBY | BRISTOL HERALD COURIER
articles.title: Plans for new hotel in Bristol, Virginia
articles.description: BRISTOL, Va. – An abandoned building that once housed a Howard Johnson motel on Euclid Avenue is getting a facelift and will open next year as a new hotel, the property owner said Monday.
